name: Adopt A Pet (jonellis)
description:
This was a group project for the Game & Interactive Media Development course at Friends of Design - Academy of Digital Arts.

A Tamagotchi revival, this pet care simulator has a mobile-first design and unfortunately has its authentication and cloud save features missing. I will be rebuilding it with Android and iOS in mind, so keep an eye on this space.

My main focus was on scripting, ensuring that systems are handled as effectively and efficiently as possible - The new iteration will definitely make use of state machines to handle the pets.
